org.sd.text.segment
Interface SplitFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDelimSplitFunction, MultiDelimSplitFunction, PatternExtractorSplitFunction, PatternFinderSplitFunction, SingleDelimSplitFunction
public interface SplitFunction

An interface for specifying the splitting of text for a SegmentSequence.

Author:
Spence Koehler
